British TV viewers are 'cringing' following the announcement of the cast of the Queen's Platinum Jubilee broadcast, described on social media as the 'most mad mash up ever.'

articles.author: Fiona Sturges
articles.title: Anatomy of a Scandal’s creators didn’t get the memo about sexual violence on screen - The Independent
articles.description: Ham-fisted dialogue and drunken camera angles are the least of the new Netflix show’s worries, writes Fiona Sturges
articles.content: In the Netflix drama Anatomy of a Scandal, a Tory MP, James Whitehouse (Rupert Friend), confesses to his wife, Sophie (Sienna Miller), that he has been having an affair with a parliamentary aide, and… [+5370 chars]

articles.author: Lucy Mangan
articles.title: Chivalry review – Steve Coogan and Sarah Solemani’s immensely satisfying #MeToo comedy - The Guardian
articles.description: What if Alan Partridge were a Hollywood hotshot in 2022? This razor-sharp show follows an old-school film producer floundering in a strange new world – and it’s got just the right amount of wrongness
articles.content: There is an undoubted sense in which new Channel 4 series Chivalry, co-written by and co-starring Steve Coogan and Sarah Solemani, asks the question, What if Alan Partridge were a successful Hollywoo… [+4396 chars]
